cells.data: -- foldMapTree :: Monoid m => (a -> m) -> Tree a -> mon foldMapTree(f, tree)	script go		property g : mReturn(f)'s |λ|		on |λ|(x)			if length of (nest of x) > 0 then				mappend(g(root of x), ¬					foldl1(my mappend, (map(go, nest of x))))			else				g(root of x)			end if		end |λ|	end script		|λ|(tree) of goend foldMapTree
